title: Remove Caffeine.ai attribution from footer

requirements.text: Remove the 'built with ♥ using caffeine.ai' text from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The attribution text 'built with ♥ using caffeine.ai' is completely removed from the Footer component
The footer layout adjusts properly after the text removal without leaving empty space or layout issues
All other footer content (contact details, business hours, social media links, copyright notice) remains intact and properly displayed

constraints: Do not modify any other footer content beyond the Caffeine.ai attribution
Maintain the existing footer layout structure and styling
nonGoals: Adding new attribution or branding text
